reasoning_log: The matching process prioritized room type identification (kitchen, bathroom, bedrooms) first, followed by distinguishing between multiple views of the same area (living room/entrance). For the kitchen, Desc_4 was matched to Image_4 based on the 'ㄇ字型料理檯面' (U-shape counter), while Desc_5 was matched to Image_5 due to the '狹長型廚房' (narrow layout) and prominent refrigerator. For the living room, Desc_3 was isolated as the close-up view of the '客廳收納牆' (Image_3). The remaining living room descriptions (Desc_1, Desc_2, Desc_11, Desc_12) were differentiated by focusing on specific features: Image_2 showed the dedicated viewing area (Desc_2), Image_1 showed the AC and wide window view (Desc_1), Image_12 emphasized the straight entrance path and clutter (Desc_11), and Image_11 provided the overall wide layout view (Desc_12). Bedroom matches were confirmed by floor type (wood vs. tile) and primary function (storage/clutter vs. study/work equipment). All 12 descriptions were successfully mapped 1:1.

matching_result_list.evidence: Living room view showing the large window ('視野開闊'), air conditioning unit ('冷氣設備現成'), and light tile floor ('地磚易清潔').

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光佳(落地窗與窗簾組合), 休息觀影區完整(沙發與電視牆配置明確), 格局方正(動線由玄關至窗邊順暢), 天花嵌燈(室內照明均勻), 家電位明確(電視與電扇位置固定), 收納外露(電視櫃與層架物品堆疊), 地面狀況良好(瓷磚平整無明顯破損)

matching_result_list.evidence: Focuses on the sofa and TV setup, confirming the '休息觀影區完整' and '家電位明確'.

matching_result_list.evidence: Close-up view of the large open shelving unit, clearly showing '大量開放收納' and the resulting '易顯雜亂'.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 大量開放收納(整面層架提供置物空間), 易顯雜亂(無門片導致視覺凌亂), 電視主牆完成(下方電視櫃方便擺放設備), 插座充足(多組電器同時使用), 地面易清理(瓷磚搭配移動電扇與清淨機)

matching_result_list.evidence: Kitchen view showing the corner counter configuration consistent with 'ㄇ字型料理檯面', along with '明火烹飪設備' and '抽油煙機配置'.

extracted_feature.raw_description: ㄇ字型料理檯面(操作動線集中實用), 廚具收納多(上、下櫃空間豐富), 明火烹飪設備(炒鍋等顯示可重度開伙), 抽油煙機配置(爐上方設排油煙設備), 工作檯面連續(備料與烹煮區銜接順), 採光不足(未見窗戶以人工照明為主), 地墊防滑(流理臺前舖墊提高安全性)

matching_result_list.evidence: View of the narrow, long kitchen hallway ('狹長型廚房') with the large refrigerator prominently visible ('冰箱位固定').

extracted_feature.raw_description: 狹長型廚房(兩側櫃體形成走廊式動線), 冰箱位固定(靠牆配置不影響進出), 收納量足夠(上下櫃與吊櫃延伸整排), 採光通風較弱(看不到對外窗), 料理與通行干擾(多人同時使用稍顯壅擠), 新式廚具(門板及檯面狀況良好)

matching_result_list.evidence: Master bedroom showing heavy stacking of boxes and items ('物品堆疊多') and a tile floor ('地面為磁磚').

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光一般(有窗但多為室內光源), 工作設備齊全(桌機與設備適合居家辦公), 空間偏小(床與書架擠在一室), 收納以開放架為主(物品外露易雜亂), 冷氣既有(壁掛機提升舒適度), 隔音需評估(大量電子設備可能產生噪音)
